amuse.interfaces
Class AmuseTask

java.lang.Object
  amuse.interfaces.AmuseTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
AmuseTaskInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
EA1plus1, GMMConverter, J48Adapter, J48Adapter, JAudioAdapter, MatlabAdapter, NaNEliminator, NFoldCrossValidator, PrincipalComponentsAnalysis, QuartileConverter, SharkAdapter, SingleEvaluator, TatumPruner, YaleAdapter, ZeroMeanUnitVarianceNormalizer
public abstract class AmuseTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements AmuseTaskInterface

All algorithms should extend this class. The algorithm runs one of Amuse tasks and is "method" (completely implemented in Amuse) or "adapter" (runs an external tool).

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Igor Vatolkin
